replies.author: ItIsEnderman
replies.txt_content: 目测是资源不够加载，请尝试更换为独立显卡启动，同时增大内存200MB.

replies.txt_content:
本帖最后由 mingarchery 于 2020-2-27 13:21 编辑

replies.author: Eicy
replies.txt_content:
net.minecraft.client.renderer.StitcherException: Unable to fit: mymod3d:items/wing3, size: 128x128, atlas: 8192x8192, atlasMax: 8192x8192 - Maybe try a lower resolution resourcepack?
请使用低分辨率的材质包（你是不是看b站某up视频了？
还不行的话听折叠的，删除那个mod
